name: Legend of Homebody Free
description:
Hi everyone, I am a Chinese indie game developer. It's been a pleasure meeting you all and I'm looking forward to talking to you all. Because our cultural backgrounds are very different, so that will be very interesting.

This is one of my newest games, and it just happened to be recently updated in English so I could come here and share it with you.

It is offered here as a free trial version, which allows you to experience the flow and story of a character in its entirety, and has no problem being treated as a full game.

When you first start playing this game, you may find it boring. But I hope you will be patient enough to finish it and maybe we will have some soul contact.

It's my first time here to show the game and I don't know what to say, so here goes. I also don't know how to decorate the page to look better.

If you like the game, you can go and buy the full version on STEAM. It doesn't matter if you don't buy it, I don't want to become a tiresome salesman.

My English is not good, so I used translation software for the above.
